ai.summary: John's Water Walk (Purple Route) is a short, easy 1.1 km hike in the UK along water edges. The route suits families and leisurely walkers seeking a peaceful outing with gentle scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat, well-trodden paths with some sections that may be muddy or slippery near the water. Expect occasional boardwalks or compact earth depending on the waterway.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on designated paths and keep a safe distance from the water's edge. Wet conditions can make surfaces slippery; wear waterproof footwear. Check local weather, and be mindful of tides or water level changes if the route runs along tidal waters. Keep children and pets close, carry a charged phone and emergency contact information, and bring additional layers in cooler months.
recommended_gear: Map or GPS device / fully charged phone
Whistle or basic first aid kit
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer, and Autumn are ideal; the route can be enjoyed year-round with appropriate footwear and weather protection.

seo.title: John's Water Walk (Purple Route) – Easy 1.1 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover John's Water Walk (Purple Route), a short and gentle 1.1 km hike along tranquil waters in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, best seasons, and what to bring.
